titleStmt.title: The Welchmens ivbilee to the honovr of St. David shewing the manner of that solemn celebration which the Welshmen annually hold in honovr of St. David : describing likewise the trve and rea[sonable] cause why they wear that day a Leek on their hans : with an excellent merry sonnet annexed unto it / composed by T. Morgan ...
titleStmt.author: Morgan, T., Gent.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
